  • Classes in org.apache.archiva.repository used by org.apache.archiva.repository 
    Class and Description
    AbstractManagedRepository
    Simple implementation of a managed repository.
    AbstractRemoteRepository
    Abstract implementation of a remote repository.
    AbstractRepository
    Implementation of a repository with the necessary fields for a bare repository.
    ContentNotFoundException
    ContentNotFoundException is thrown in response for requests for content that is not the repository.
    EditableManagedRepository
    The editable part of a managed repository.
    EditableRemoteRepository
    The editable part of a remote repository
    EditableRepository
    This is the editable part of a repository.
    LayoutException
    LayoutException
    ManagedRepository
    Represents a managed repository, that is readable and writable.
    ManagedRepositoryContent
    ManagedRepositoryContent interface for interacting with a managed repository in an abstract way, without the need for processing based on filesystem paths, or working with the database.
    ReleaseScheme
    Repository release schemes that change the handling of artifacts
    RemoteRepository
    This represents a repository that is not fully managed by archiva.
    RemoteRepositoryContent
    RemoteRepositoryContent interface for interacting with a remote repository in an abstract way, without the need for processing based on URLs, or working with the database.
    Repository
    Base interface for repositories.
    RepositoryCapabilities
    Describe the capabilities a repository implementation supports.
    RepositoryContent
    Common aspects of content provider interfaces
    RepositoryContentFactory
    RepositoryContentRequest
    RepositoryContentProvider
    A repository content provider creates repository content instances for specific repository types.
    RepositoryCredentials
    Credentials used to login to a remote repository.
    RepositoryEvent
    Repository event.
    RepositoryEvent.EventType 
    RepositoryEventHandler
    Implementations of this interface are able to handle repository event listeners
    RepositoryEventListener
    Listener that accepts repository events.
    RepositoryException
    RepositoryException
    RepositoryProvider
    This interface must be implemented by the repository implementations.
    RepositoryType
    The repository types that are known to the system.
    StandardCapabilities
    Capability implementation.
    UnsupportedFeatureException
    This exception is thrown if a given feature is not supported by the repository.
    UnsupportedURIException
    Exception is thrown, if the URI is syntactically correct, but is not supported by the underlying repository implementation
  • Classes in org.apache.archiva.repository used by org.apache.archiva.repository.connector
